workflowname.ftpReceiveAdapter.scenarioN.description: The name of the scenario for this specific Receive Adapter.

workflowname.ftpReceiveAdapter.ftpReceiv.description: The path where the File connector looks for new/updated files.

workflowname.ftpReceiveAdapter.fileNameM.description: The file mask to use when checking for files.

workflowname.ftpReceiveAdapter.ftpMaxFil.description: The max number of files the File Connector will retrieve per polling interval.

workflowname.ftpReceiveAdapter.ftpRecurr.description: The frequency with which to check for new files on the File server.
The interval with which to check for new files on the File server.
